name: Achievement: Repertoire
description:
Namecard style.
Perhaps a melody may exist that collects and contains all the wondrous music in the world. Surging heartbeats mark the musical phrase, anxious thoughts form brief rests, and within the notes lie all things â€” laughter, tears, forgotten dreams, and dancing raindrops...
source: Reward for completing all achievements under "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies"
